instructions: Mix besan, salt, chili powder, garam masala, and baking soda.
Add water gradually to form a thick batter.
Heat oil in a deep frying pan.
Drop spoonfuls of batter into the hot oil.
Deep fry until golden brown and crispy.
Drain on paper towels to remove excess oil.
cooking_tips: Adjust the amount of spices according to your preference.
Ensure the oil is hot enough before frying for crispy pakode.
Do not overcrowd the pan while frying to ensure even cooking.
Drain the pakode well to prevent them from becoming soggy.
